Uses of Package
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem

Packages that use com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core The starting package of the framework. 
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.data Provides the interfaces to be implemented by native capable classes, user defined or predefined, with the exception of interfaces related to methods. 
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.listener Provides interfaces and classes used to register callbacks and event listeners of life cycle of native instances. 
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem Provides utility classes and interfaces to manage the life cycle of native instances, native memory attachment, read and write, and Dynamic Link Library managers. 
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.typedec Provides utility interfaces to declare native types. 
com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.util Provides utility classes to native capable objects and primitive values. 
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core
DLLManager
          The NativeManager interface is used to manage the Dynamic Link Libraries loaded by the framework.
JNIEasyLibrary
          The JNIEasyLibrary interface represents the framework's Dynamic Link Library (JNIEasy.dll).
LockedRegistry
          LockedRegistry is a simple wrapper of a synchronized java.util.HashSet collection; it is included as a utility and can be easily replaced with your own.
NativeManager
          The NativeManager interface is used to manage the native lifecycle of native capable objects and some native memory tasks.
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.data
NativeStateManager
          Every native object instance has an internal object implementing NativeStateManager interface.
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.listener
NativeAddress
          The interface NativeAddress is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native address.
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem
DLLManager
          The NativeManager interface is used to manage the Dynamic Link Libraries loaded by the framework.
DynamicLibrary
          The DynamicLibrary interface represents a loaded Dynamic Link Library (DLL) by the framework.
NativeAddress
          The interface NativeAddress is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native address.
NativeBuffer
          The interface NativeBuffer is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native memory block.
NativeBufferIterator
          The interface NativeBufferIterator is implemented by the framework to provide a native buffer iterator.
NativeManager
          The NativeManager interface is used to manage the native lifecycle of native capable objects and some native memory tasks.
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.typedec
NativeAddress
          The interface NativeAddress is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native address.
 

Classes in com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.mem used by com.innowhere.jnieasy.core.util
NativeBuffer
          The interface NativeBuffer is implemented by the framework to encapsulate a native memory block.
NativeManager
          The NativeManager interface is used to manage the native lifecycle of native capable objects and some native memory tasks.
NativeStateManager
          Every native object instance has an internal object implementing NativeStateManager interface.
